effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
If you have Pachirisu in play, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Buizel during your opponent’s next turn.

description.en: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
